title: About Time Watch Face
summary: Chronocraft's classic watch face for the smartwatch generation.

descriptionHTML:
"A classic watch face for the smartwatch generation"

Chronocraft envisioned the sophisticated intricate watch face design, we released a sneak preview earlier this year, for those who have been following us, the wait is now over. It’s About Time.

Featuring a mechanical cogwheel design emulating two gears working in tandem, rotating in unison with the secondhand.

Designed from the ground up, specifically for round android wear devices.

We have taken several factors into this design:

• App notifications do not obscure the main clock face.
• Complementing the Moto 360’s bottom sensors (flat tyre) with a nicely positioned date value.
• A simplified ambient mode interface

Supported Devices:
• Motorola Moto360
• LG G WATCH R
• Currently not supporting rectangular Smartwatches (Coming soon.)
• Android phone requires 4.3 and up, Android Wear requires 5.0 update.

Got an idea for a watch face or suggestions for improving this app?
Get in touch, we are committed to answering questions and feedback in a timely fashion.

Designed & engineered by Chronocraft.
www.chrono-craft.com
comments: Looks good but I'd like to see some options: set ambient mode same as lit face (just without movement), multiple backgrounds (e.g. black, gray and white) and color themes.
Bad ambient mode Watch face a bit too small for lg watch. Ambient mode just plain not well designed.

Can be improved The ambient mode is what people will see most of the time when they look at their watch. If you guys can make the ambient mode the same as the face when the watch is active (without animations) I would give it 5 stars. Look at the ranger watch face for example which ambient mode is almost as good as the face when the watch is active
too small! looks bad on lg g watch r Doesn't look good like the photo's in play store!
beautiful.... but really could use a square version.
